pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'PM4py' Process Mining Library // Interface to 'PM4py' http://pm4py.org, a process mining library in 'Python'. This package uses the 'reticulate' package to act as a bridge between 'PM4Py' and the 'R' package 'bupaR'. It provides several process discovery algorithms, evaluation measures, and alignments.
